name:
Metroid Prime™: Federation
Force Update Ver. 1.1.0
formal_name:
Metroid Prime™: Federation
Force Update Ver. 1.1.0
description: This is an update for the Metroid Prime™: Federation Force game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of Metroid Prime™: Federation Force.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
